## Import data from files

```{r}
#| echo: fenced
library(RStata)
df1 <- RStata::stata("import excel ./data/dataset1.xlsx",
                     data.out = TRUE)
```

```{python}
#| echo: fenced
import pandas as pd
df2 = pd.read_csv('./data/dataset1.csv')
```

```{r}
#| echo: fenced
library(haven)
df3 <- haven::read_dta("./data/dataset1.dta")
```

::: {.panel-tabset}
